snippet.title: RPG Cross Hearts Arcadia - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
©2012 KEMCO/Hit-Point

'RPG Cross Hearts Arcadia' is now available on Android/iOS!
Head for the Genesis Sanctuary!!

Download it now on:
App Store:
https://itunes.apple.com/app/id671770773?mt=8
Google Play store:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=kemco.hitpoint.callofalgiz

Researching an ancient ruin, Nirva hears a strange voice that leads him to
gg" deep in the ruin which he takes home.
In time, that egg turns into a curious fairy.
The fairy named Tylt asks Nirva to travel to the Genesis Sanctuary togethe
A fantasy RPG where you set off from the floating continent Nirva calls ho
h his mysterious fairy Tylt on an adventure to find the Genesis Sanctuary!

■Tylt - A fairy that evolves
■Travel together with friends
■Create equipment at the Forge
■Challenger's Hall

※All graphics terms, characters and elements are subject to change in the actual product.
